DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to investigate the muscle metabolism in individuals with chronic non-specific low back pain (CNSLBP) to enhance our understanding of chronic back pain.
DOC.brief_title: Functioning Disturbance in Chronic Back Pain: Altered Muscle Metabolism
DOC.criteria: The NSCBP group: At least 6 patients will be included in this study. All patients referred to Vestfold Hospital Trust, Kysthospitalet, diagnosed with chronic NSCBP >3 months duration will be invited to participate in the study. The invitation will be in a written form. anamnesis of medical or drug abuse, surgery on the musculoskeletal system of the trunk, known congenital malformation of the spine or scoliosis, body mass index > 27 kg/m2, systemicneurologicaldegenerative disease, history of stroke, psychiatric disorder, pregnancy and abnormal blood pressure. The subjects will be asked not to use any medications except for paracetamol preparations one week before examination and instructed not to perform any backstraining exercise for 48 h prior to the study, except for ordinary daily working and/or leisure activities.
